alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 10:21PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN FRANKLIN AND NORTH CENTRAL PICKAWAY COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1021 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Grove City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Reynoldsburg, Grove City, Bexley, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Lake Darby, Whitehall, Obetz, Lithopolis, Urbancrest, Valleyview, Harrisburg, Orient, Lockbourne, Brice, Blacklick Estates, Georgesville, Darbydale and Lincoln Village. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 97 and 111. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 91 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
